full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

## **Request for Proposal: W0103-229047 Weapons Vault**

The Department of National Defence has issued a [Request for Proposal (RFP)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16085221?extsite=MTYwODUyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for the supply, installation, and assembly of a modular Small Arms Storage vault for use at one of their locations in [British Columbia, Canada](#Regions).

### **Key Information**

| **Field**            | **Value**                                                     |
|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Tender Number**    | WS3395657327                                                 |
| **Tender Name**      | W0103-229047 Weapons Vault                                    |
| **Opening Date**     | 2023-05-25T14:00:00 (Closed)                                |
| **Posted Date**      | 2023-04-25                                                  |
| **Contracting Entity**| Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)     |
| **End User**          | Department of National Defence (DND)                         |
| **Trade Agreements**  | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Local                |

### **Pricing**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the [lowest price](#SelectionCriteria) for the supply, installation, and assembly of the modular Small Arms Storage vault.

### **Technical Requirements**

The successful bidder will be required to supply and install a modular Small Arms Storage vault, which will be used for the secure storage of small arms and ammunition at the DND location in [British Columbia](#Regions).

### **Contact Information**

For more information on this RFP, please contact:

* Anthony Mitch (SPAC/PSPC) at [mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
